pr_title: [DOCS] Add data streams to rollup APIs

timeline.message: [DOCS] Add data streams to rollup APIs

timeline.bodyText: This part might be a little tricky. Data streams can serve only as non-rollup indices so multiple data streams could be specified just as multiple non-rollup indices may be specified. I don't know how important it is to make all of that clear.
